Hello, I'm Adriano

/aad•ree•aa•no/

I'm a Fullstack Web Developer and Student with a special interest for utility first CSS. I love working on challenging projects as they provided the opportunity for me to grow as a developer.

I currently do mostly Frontend drawing user interfaces Tailwind and creating interactive pages using Vue, but when is necessary i also do the Backend including static serving and api endpoints with Express .

Want to see more? Checkout my projects here or at my Github account. You can also download my resume.

For contact send an email to adriano.finco.509@gmail.com or message me on Linkedin.
